# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String{<:AbstractChar}, text_width::Int=10)
    text_array = split(text, " ")
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    append!(lines, "")

    for word in text_array
        if length(current_line * word) > text_width
            current_line = ""
            append!(lines, "")
        end
        current_line = current_line * word * " "
    end

    return lines
end

@test wrap_string("Hello World.", 10) == ["Hello", "World."]
@test wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", 20) == ["Lorem ipsum dolor", "sit amet,", "consectetur", "adipiscing elit."]
```
